title: Bug 120922 "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved
description: Bug 120922 "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved. Other pages cannot be accessed until the changes are saved. Currently, the user is prompted with a dialog that says "Do you want to save the changes?" with options: Yes, No, Cancel. Choosing Yes saves the changes, No discards the changes, and Cancel does nothing and remains on the Source page. Additionally, the dialog is titled "Error" (including the quotes).
OB: The "Dirty Page" behavior prompt is unclear and the dialog is titled "Error".
EB: A more intuitive prompt should be displayed informing the user that the XML Report Design has been modified. The dialog title should be appropriate and without the quotes.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open XML Report Designer editor.
2. Make changes to the report.
3. Attempt to access other pages without saving the changes.

The prompt and dialog title should be observed as described in the description.
